papers.translation[0].definitions[0].def: pieces of paper with writing on them that you use in your work, at meetings etc
papers.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I left some important papers in my briefcase.
papers.translation[0].definitions[1].def: documents and letters concerning someone’s private or public life
papers.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: While I was organizing Simon’s papers I came across his diaries.
papers.translation[0].definitions[3].def: official documents such as your passport, identity card etc
papers.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: My papers are all in order  (=they are legal and correct).
